query: UPDATE decisions SET amount = '$40,000 AUD', subject = 'Payment Approval: $40,000 AUD → External Beneficiary', context = 'Transaction flagged by rule PAY-004. Velocity check indicates 30% deviation from standard pattern. Beneficiary is a known entity but amount exceeds daily auto-approval limit.' WHERE decisionId = 'DEC-2024-001';
